resources.string: Your Profile Details are listed below:
This notification confirms that the order is placed
You do not have any favorite restaurants
You haven\'t placed any orders yet

A.1 The Food HeadQuaters is a food delivery service that does Home Deliveries to it customers from over 200 restaurants outlets in Pune Banglore and NaviMumbai. We are one of INDIAs premier Home Delivery Service. Operational since 2020 we have served over 2000 people so far.

A.2 YES if you are looking at using the app to place orders. But we also accept phone orders. When you have decided what you want to order you can call us and place the order or alternately while taking delivery details our staff can register you in our database with minimal details. This helps us easily process your next order.
Yes of course However each restaurant order will be treated as a different order. So the delivery charges may be applicable for each order.

A.3 Each restaurant gives us a small percentage of the order amount. But for small orders we cannot afford to deliver within the commission we receive. Instead of declining such orders we give you the option of delivering it to you if you are prepared to pay the delivery charges

A.5 We make every effort to keep the prices updated and accurate. Prices listed on this website are however approximate and subject to changes by the Restaurant and Taxes. The final price is as per the ACTUAL BILL raised by the Restaurant and presented to you, at the time of the delivery.

A.6 Sorry, as a practice we do not give discounts as we work on very slim margins already. But we could check with the Restaurant and IF they offer any special discount we will be happy to pass it on to you
